nodes.text:
The Shield was an organization of security specialists. It was founded by Peert Ginzork and its members included Filice Ginzork, Keal Roscon and Baarak Kalaim.
The Shield began as a group that protected corporate couriers who had to travel among systems. It eventually branched out to handle executive bodyguard duties and then counter-espionage. It has been a successful independent security force.
